title: Does Partner™ Stop Ice Dams From Forming?
text: Partner™ offers protection against ice dams in 4 different ways: No clogged gutters in winter, angled so snow slides off and doesn’t freeze, snow melt drains and guards are made from steel to stop “buckling”.

title: Can Partner™ Handle Heavy Rains?
text: Yes, absolutely. Our gutter guards are installed across America – including in areas with torrential downpours and hurricanes!

title: What If Leaves & Debris Simply Pile Up On Top Of Partner?
text: Partner️™ is installed at an ideal angle so debris slides right off, never builds up on top of the filter guards and stops water from overshooting the gutter.
